titleStmt.title: Medico mastix, or, A pill for the doctor being a short reply to a late vindictive letter, sent to Mr. Vicars in the name of Doctor Bastwick, concerning Leiut. [sic] Coll. John Lilburn / by E.A., a she Presbiterian.
titleStmt.author: E. A., she Presbiterian.
Vicars, John, 1579 or 80-1652.
Bastwick, John, 1593-1654.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
